thread.section_title: Technology - Internet Related Businesses For Sale in the US
thread.title: Niche Online Pr Book Marketing Company
thread.title_full: Niche Online Pr Book Marketing Company

title: Niche Online Pr Book Marketing Company
text: Questions Business Summary 4 year old Online PR Book Marketing Company offering PR packages to author's looking for a risk free way to announce their book to the media. Strong, easy to remember and keyword rich domain name with high average order value of over $150. Owner spends less than 20 hours per week running the business. 4,500 customers in database. 95% of orders are processed over the Internet. The business has no traditional employees, only subcontractors. Business is currently home based and can be operated anywhere in the world. Business is marketed through diversified revenue channels with 43% from organic search engine results, 15% from Direct Traffic, 28% from Pay Per Click Advertising, 14% from Referrals and Social Media. Strong growth opportunities include: additional PPC Marketing, creation of an aggressive email marketing campaign to current database, Social Marketing, Affiliate Marketing campaigns and expansion into other related products and services marketed to current customer base. Strong transitional support will be provided to the new owner. Owner is selling to focus on career change back into the education industry. Financials
